nodes.bodyText: Why not having a blob provider property instead of Framework one?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -122,6 +123,14 @@
      */
     public static final String MULTIPART_COPY_PART_SIZE_PROPERTY = "nuxeo.s3.multipart.copy.part.size";
 
+    /**
+     * Framework property to disable usage of the proxy environment variables ({@code nuxeo.http.proxy.*}) for the
+     * connection to the S3 endpoint.
+     *
+     * @since 11.1
+     */
+    public static final String DISABLE_PROXY_PROPERTY = "nuxeo.s3.proxy.disabled";

nodes.bodyText: This controls usage of the proxy configuration properties which are themselves framework properties, so it's logical to have the enabled/disabled flag be the same kind of property.

nodes.bodyText: In case it remains a Framework property, Framework#isBooleanPropertyTrue should do the work.
